main: ^Hello sir. I need to see your licence to forage in these parts sir.
^Hi Officer, I wasn’t aware that I needed a licence…
^Ahh well you know sir, no licence means a 5000 Rand fine.
^Oh gosh, I just washed up here a couple days ago. I definitely don’t have that kind of money.
^Well then I have to confiscate everything you have foraged.
^Oh no, Ouma will be so upset with me.
^Ah but you know, my friend, is there anything else you have that you want to give me?
^Are you asking for a bribe? I don't think that is very ethical-
^No! No bride sir. I am just making conversation here.
^Oh…well I don’t have anything other than my foragings.
^That is a shame sir. I must take everything you have foraged today.
^“Shoot…okay. Thank you officer. Have a nice day!
